title: [SOLVED]1398 LCD only question
message:
A long time ago I put a late 2013 LCD only into a 2015 lid and it has been sitting here for years.

Now that I install into a late 2013 L8300 keeps blowing.  Is it the 2015 lid causing the problem I am guessing. Probably the backlight in the lid correct? So the LCD and lid have to match as well? I think the LVDS cables are the same.

title: [SOLVED]1398 LCD only question
message:
So I've tried again and everything was working great.  But when I assemble everything L8300 blows again (3rd time).  
Weird.

title: [SOLVED]1398 LCD only question
message: Disregard -----  it is the flex cables from the LCD.  Goes from working to not working and fuse blowing by moving.  Thanks self : )
